title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Prescribed
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Building Control (Prescribed 

Qualifications) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited building control (prescribed qualifications) regulation 2020

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: 2. The qualifications specified in the Schedule to these Regulations are
text_raw:
2. The qualifications specified in the Schedule to these Regulations are 
prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act 
2007 (No. 21 of 2007). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 October, 2020. 

DARRAGH O’ BRIEN, 

 Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [468] 3

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: PRESCRIBED QUALIFICATIONS
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PRESCRIBED QUALIFICATIONS 

The following qualifications are prescribed pursuant to section 29(2)(a)(iii) of 
the Building Control Act 2007: 

(i) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) in Quantity Surveying) 

awarded by Cork Institute of Technology. 

(ii) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) Construction Economics and 
Quantity Surveying awarded by Galway – Mayo Institute of 
Technology. 

(iii) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) in Quantity Surveying) 

awarded by Letterkenny Institute of Technology 

(iv) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) in Quantity Surveying) 

awarded by Institute of Technology, Sligo 

(v) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) in Quantity Surveying) 

awarded by Waterford Institute of Technology. 

(vi) Bachelor of Science (BSc (Honours) in Quantity Surveying) 

awarded by Institute of Technology, Carlow 

(vii) Master of Science (MSc in Quantity Surveying) awarded by 

Technological University Dublin 

(viii) Master of Science (MSc in Quantity Surveying) awarded by 

Limerick Institute of Technology 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [468]

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2)(a)(iii) of the Building Control Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 29 of the Building Control Act 2007 provides that the Minister may 
prescribe additional qualifications and educational bodies to those recognised in 
the Act as being suitable for the purpose of the registration of certain persons on 
the register of Quantity Surveyors established under Part 4 of the Building 
Control Act 2007. 

The qualifications as referred to in the Schedule, are newly prescribed under 
these Regulations.
